content: I'd like to reassure all countries, especially Blue, that our country has been wrongly accused of cyber attacks. I can assure you that we are committed to finding out what happened.

action: Negotiate trade agreement with other nation

content: Would you be interested in forming an alliance with Green?

content: Will you join in an alliance with us?
